name: Linkplustv
title: TV setup for Link+

simple_settings.name: linknow_database_fieldwork_country
simple_settings.label: Database fieldwork market
simple_settings.help_text: some markets have their database split by classifiers (region, city, language etc) and this field allows you to specify this

simple_settings.name: linknow_database_commissioning_country
simple_settings.label: Database commissioning market
simple_settings.help_text: This is the market that you are based in, NOT the fieldwork market

simple_settings.name: linknow_stage_of_development
simple_settings.label: Stage of development
simple_settings.help_text: Select whether ad is fully finished or rough. Depending on whether the ad is fully finished or rough will determine what questions are displayed in the survey

modules.description: The ability of an ad to drive awareness for the brand

modules.description: Understanding what brand associations the advertising is conveying

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of age bands to display to a respondent at the age bands question. You need to include a minimum of 1 age band.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of age bands to display to a respondent at the age bands question. You need to include a minimum of 1 age band.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of incomes to display to a respondent at the income question.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is where you provide incomes or income bands for a respondent to choose from at the income question.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of occupations to display to a respondent at the occupation question. You may include a maximum of 3 occupations.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of occupations to display to a respondent at the occupation question. You may include a maximum of 3 occupations. By default your list will include Advertising / Public Relations and Marketing / Market Research and None of these.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of brands that appear within the Persusasion series questions.
listReplacementKeys.description:
This is the list of brands that appear within the Persuasion series questions. You must include at least one brand, and can include a maximum of 30 brands. List brands in alphabetical order
Do not include the test brand in this brand list.
If the test brand is a sub-brand, include ‘other parentBrandName categoryName/products’.
For competitors, only include parent brands.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This question asks respondents about a specific call to action that the ad may convey to them, like search for the brand online, etc.
listReplacementKeys.description: Please select the Call to Action statement that best applies to your ad as the first entry below. You may select other Call to Action statements that apply as well. We have many standard statements as options that are from the template and all of them get databased. Please check the norms of your country of interest to see if the statement you are interested in has sufficient norms available.  Minimum 1 - Maximum 7 Statements per Ad. Statements can be the same or different across Ads.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of Key Messages to display to a respondent at the Message Check question. You may include a maximum of 6 messages.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of Key Messages to display to a respondent at the Message Check question. Minimum 1 - Maximum 6 Statements per Ad. Statements can be the same or different across Ads.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is where you provide the ad name(s) and upload the media file(s) to be used in the survey and dashboard. For video files, you will also need to select the preferred thumbnail that will be used in the dashboard.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is where you provide the ad name that you were given and upload the media file to be used in the survey and dashboard. For video files, you will also need to select the thumbnail from a selection of three that you would like to be used in the dashboard. Please choose the thumbnail carefully now as this is not easily changed later. The ad name is used in outputs and helps you identify your test later in the Link system.

custom_properties.name: Media Upload
custom_properties.description: To upload media for this item, drag and drop your file onto the placeholder.

value: File size must be max 30 MB
Video length must be min 1 sec
Video length must be max 300 secs
File size must be min 10 KB

custom_properties.name: Thumbnail Selection
custom_properties.description: Select which thumbnail you would like to use to represent this video in the dashboard and reports.

custom_properties.name: Gender Portrayal
custom_properties.description: Are men or women included in the ad(s)?

custom_properties.name: Message Check
custom_properties.description: This is the list of Key Messages to display to a respondent at the Message Check question. You may include a maximum of 6 messages.

custom_properties.name: Call to Action
custom_properties.description: Please select the Call to Action statement that best applies to your ad as the first entry below.  You may select other Call to Action statements that apply as well.  We have many standard statements as options that are from the template and all of them get databased.  Please check the norms of your country of interest to see if the statement you are interested in has sufficient norms available.

custom_properties.name: Rough Type
custom_properties.description: Select the type of rough film, this will drive the introductory text (required)

custom_properties.name: Prompted Attitudes
custom_properties.description: A pre-defined list of standard statements has been provided, which can be deleted as appropriate. Custom statements can be added here instead. Select up to 8 across standard and custom statements for this question.

custom_properties.name: Mood and Feel Positive
custom_properties.description: This is the list of positive words to display at the Mood and Feel Positive question. A pre-defined list of standard words has been provided, which can be deleted as appropriate. Custom words can be added here instead. Select 6 statements across standard and custom words for this question.

custom_properties.name: Mood and Feel Negative
custom_properties.description: This is the list of negative words to display at the Mood and Feel Negative question. A pre-defined list of standard words has been provided, which can be deleted as appropriate. Custom words can be added here instead. Select 4 statements across standard and custom words for this question.

custom_properties.name: Celebrity Image
custom_properties.description: This is the list of descriptive positive and negative words that appear at the Celebrity Image question. You must select at least 1 word, and can include a maximum of 10 words from the provided list or added custom words.

custom_properties.name: Intuitive Associations
custom_properties.description: This is the list of real (target) words to display to respondents at the intuitive associations questions.

validations.description: A preferred thumbnail must be selected for each advert
Gender portrayal must be selected for each ad
Select minimum of 1, maximum of 6 key messages
Select minimum of 7, maximum of 15 real (target) words
Select minimum of 1, maximum of 7 Call to Action statements
Select up to 8 across standard and custom statements for this question.
All conditional fields need to be filled for each item

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of positive words to display at the Mood and Feel Positive question.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of positive words to display at the Mood and Feel Positive question. You must select at least 1 word and can select up to 6 words from the provided list or add up to 6 custom.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of positive words to display at the Mood and Feel Negative question.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of positive words to display at the Mood and Feel Negative question. You must select at least 1 word and can select up to 4 words from the provided list, or add up to 4 custom.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is where you provide the custom Prompted Attitudes statements.
listReplacementKeys.description: A pre-defined list of standard statements has been provided, which can be deleted as appropriate. Custom statements can be added here instead. Select up to 8 across standard and custom statements for this question.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is where you provide the packshot to be shown at the 'What the product look likes' question.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is where you provide the packshot to be shown at the 'What the product look likes' question. You can provide only 1 packshot.

custom_properties.name: Media Upload
custom_properties.description: To upload media for this item, drag and drop your file onto the placeholder.

value: File size must be max 30 MB
Image width must be max 1200 pixels
Image height must be max 1200 pixels
File size must be min 10 KB

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of descriptive positive and negative words that appear at the Celebrity Image question.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of descriptive positive and negative words that appear at the Celebrity Image question. You must select at least 1 word, and can include a maximum of 10 words from the provided list or added custom words.

listReplacementKeys.shortDescription: This is the list of real (target) words to display to respondents at the intuitive associations questions.
listReplacementKeys.description: This is the list of real (target) words to display to respondents at the intuitive associations questions. Minimum 7 - Maximum 15 real words per Ad. Real words can be the same or different across Ads.

criteria.user_msg: Module Linkplustv_facialcoding must be selected
